General.Name: Karora Resources Inc
General.Description: Karora Resources Inc. operates as a multi-asset mineral resource company in Australia. The company explores for gold and nickel deposits. It holds 100% interests in the Beta Hunt Gold Mine; the Higginsville Gold Operations; and Spargos Reward Gold Project located in Western Australia. The company was formerly known as Royal Nickel Corporation and changed its name to Karora Resources Inc. in June 2020. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: Ground Floor, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
